html: #EqualPay Day is when women working full time finally have their salaries catch up to men’s from the year prior. Last week, the House passed the Paycheck Fairness Act, bringing us one step closer to ensuring that every woman can take home the pay she rightfully earns.
text:
#EqualPay Day is when women working full time finally have their salaries catch up to men’s from the year prior. 

Last week, the House passed the Paycheck Fairness Act, bringing us one step closer to ensuring that every woman can take home the pay she rightfully earns.

html: I say this to the President, and his defenders in Congress: You may think it’s okay how Trump and his associates interacted with Russians during the campaign. I don’t. I think it’s immoral. I think it’s unethical. I think it’s unpatriotic. And yes, I think it’s corrupt.pic.twitter.com/nTdgRVfssQ
text:
I say this to the President, and his defenders in Congress:

You may think it’s okay how Trump and his associates interacted with Russians during the campaign.

I don’t.

I think it’s immoral. I think it’s unethical. I think it’s unpatriotic. And yes, I think it’s corrupt.pic.twitter.com/nTdgRVfssQ

html: LGBTQ Americans still face discrimination in employment, housing, & other core areas of life in more than half of the United States. I am proud to be an original co-sponsor of the #EqualityAct to help put an end to this discrimination.pic.twitter.com/XHJ5nf1PEH

html: Whatever your number 1 issue, I ask that you make campaign finance reform your number 2. (The culture of corruption caused by the relentless pursuit of money in politics is what stands in the way of us getting to work on your number 1.) It’s time to fix this. #ForThePeople #HR1pic.twitter.com/iAryDYcGsO
text:
Whatever your number 1 issue, I ask that you make campaign finance reform your number 2.

(The culture of corruption caused by the relentless pursuit of money in politics is what stands in the way of us getting to work on your number 1.)

It’s time to fix this. #ForThePeople #HR1pic.twitter.com/iAryDYcGsO

html: "These are not partisan issues among the American people... when I vote yes on H.R. 1, I’ll be doing what the vast majority of my constituents are demanding, to make our democracy work better for everyone, no matter our party or point of view. I can’t wait to cast that vote."pic.twitter.com/pqJT2U2z5v

I can’t wait to cast that vote."pic.twitter.com/pqJT2U2z5v

html: Since the repeal of #NetNeutrality, ISPs are already throttling streaming speeds, up charging for HD and picking winners and losers. Consumers are left watching the internet slowly change in front of their eyes. It's time to #SaveTheNet.pic.twitter.com/L6d5MnC1rU
text: Since the repeal of #NetNeutrality, ISPs are already throttling streaming speeds, up charging for HD and picking winners and losers. Consumers are left watching the internet slowly change in front of their eyes. It's time to #SaveTheNet.pic.twitter.com/L6d5MnC1rU

html: "The Emergencies Act is for genuine emergencies; it is not a get-out-of-the-Constitution-free card for presidents who want something that Congress won’t give them."pic.twitter.com/xVVgj8sWjp

html: We have a President declaring a state of emergency to take money from the US military, to seize land from Texas ranchers, to build a wall that the Congress of the United States refused to give him money to build. That shouldn't happen in a Constitutional Democracy.pic.twitter.com/CUCfWYJrIA
text: We have a President declaring a state of emergency to take money from the US military, to seize land from Texas ranchers, to build a wall that the Congress of the United States refused to give him money to build. That shouldn't happen in a Constitutional Democracy.pic.twitter.com/CUCfWYJrIA
